mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_RESERVATION ( USER_NO, MACHINE_NO, RESERVE_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, RESERVE_OPTION, RESERVE_PRICE, RESERVE_STATUS, QR_CODE ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{machineNo}, #{reserveDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{reserveOption}, #{reservePrice}, '예약중', #{qrCode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_RESERVATION SET RESERVE_STATUS = '완료' WHERE RESERVE_STATUS = '사용중' AND ( RESERVE_DATE < CURDATE() OR (RESERVE_DATE = CURDATE() AND END_TIME <= CURTIME()) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_RESERVATION_HISTORY (RESERVE_NO, USER_NO, MACHINE_NO, RESERVE_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, RESERVE_OPTION, RESERVE_PRICE) SELECT RESERVE_NO, USER_NO, MACHINE_NO, RESERVE_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, RESERVE_OPTION, RESERVE_PRICE FROM TBL_RESERVATION WHERE RESERVE_STATUS = '완료'
mapper.select: SELECT MACHINE_NO, MACHINE_TYPE, MACHINE_STATUS FROM TBL_MACHINE WHERE MACHINE_TYPE = #{machineType} ORDER BY MACHINE_NO

SELECT reserve_no AS reserveNo, user_no AS userNo, machine_no AS machineNo, reserve_date AS reserveDate, start_time AS StartTime, end_time AS EndTime, reserve_option AS reserveOption, reserve_price AS reservePrice, reserve_status AS reserveStatus, qr_code AS qrCode FROM tbl_reservation WHERE reserve_no = #{reserveNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_RESERVATION SET RESERVE_STATUS = '사용중' WHERE RESERVE_NO = #{reserveNo} AND RESERVE_STATUS = '예약중'
mapper.select: /* 현재 예약 상태 조회 */ SELECT RESERVE_NO, USER_NO, MACHINE_NO, RESERVE_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, RESERVE_OPTION, RESERVE_PRICE, RESERVE_STATUS, QR_CODE FROM TBL_RESERVATION r WHERE r.MACHINE_NO = #{machineNo} AND r.RESERVE_DATE = #{selectedDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ( /* 선택한 시간이 정확히 예약 시작 시간과 일치하는 경우 */ (r.START_TIME = #{selectedTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND r.RESERVE_STATUS IN ('예약중', '사용중')) OR /* 사용중인 예약의 시간대 내에 있는 경우 */ ( r.RESERVE_STATUS = '사용중' AND #{selectedTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} BETWEEN r.START_TIME AND DATE_SUB(r.END_TIME, INTERVAL 1 MINUTE) ) ) ORDER BY r.RESERVE_NO DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: DELETE r FROM TBL_RESERVATION r WHERE r.RESERVE_STATUS = '예약중' AND ( (r.RESERVE_DATE = CURDATE() AND NOW() >= DATE_ADD(CONCAT(r.RESERVE_DATE, ' ', r.START_TIME), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) AND NOW() <= CONCAT(r.RESERVE_DATE, ' ', r.END_TIME)) OR r.RESERVE_DATE < CURDATE() )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_USER u JOIN TBL_RESERVATION r ON u.USER_NO = r.USER_NO SET u.CANCEL_COUNT = u.CANCEL_COUNT + 1 WHERE r.RESERVE_STATUS = '예약중' AND ( (r.RESERVE_DATE = CURDATE() AND NOW() >= DATE_ADD(CONCAT(r.RESERVE_DATE, ' ', r.START_TIME), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) AND NOW() <= CONCAT(r.RESERVE_DATE, ' ', r.END_TIME)) OR r.RESERVE_DATE < CURDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.USER_NO FROM TBL_RESERVATION r WHERE r.RESERVE_STATUS = '예약중' AND ( (r.RESERVE_DATE = CURDATE() AND NOW() >= DATE_ADD(CONCAT(r.RESERVE_DATE, ' ', r.START_TIME), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) AND NOW() <= CONCAT(r.RESERVE_DATE, ' ', r.END_TIME)) OR r.RESERVE_DATE < CURDATE() )
